data.lyric:
[ti:Like I Loved You]
[ar:Brett Young]
[al:Brett Young]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Like I Loved You - Brett Young
[00:06.99]Written by：Brett Charles Young/Jesse Lee
[00:13.99]Would've thought you wrote down every word
[00:16.25]
[00:19.54]Goodbye spelled out like it had been rehearsed
[00:22.63]
[00:25.73]There ain't no point in trying to change your mind
[00:29.21]
[00:32.64]Seems like
[00:33.32]
[00:35.30]You've got it all figured out
[00:36.95]
[00:38.89]You're alright
[00:39.50]
[00:41.41]With the way this is going down
[00:43.73]Don't tell me we can still be friends
[00:46.14]
[00:46.70]Hanging on the weekend
[00:48.06]You're gonna be okay if I start seeing somebody new
[00:51.67]
[00:52.73]You hope that I do
[00:54.17]It won't be long
[00:55.80]
[00:57.47]Till I forget to call every time that I'm drinking
[01:00.44]And you ain't the love song
[01:02.13]I can't keep from singing
[01:03.73]I gotta be honest
[01:05.22]You really believe that's the truth
[01:07.19]
[01:08.08]You never loved me like I loved you
[01:10.27]
[01:17.04]By the way you're talking you would think
[01:19.63]
[01:22.83]You never had any real feelings for me
[01:25.62]
[01:29.24]And if you think I can look across the bar
[01:32.31]
[01:35.80]And see you
[01:36.52]
[01:38.55]In someone else's arms
[01:39.77]
[01:41.46]And I need you
[01:42.90]
[01:44.55]Oh who do you think you are
[01:46.95]Trying to tell me we can still be friends
[01:49.22]

[01:50.98]You're gonna be okay if I start seeing somebody new
[01:55.99]You hope that I do
[01:57.09]

[01:59.13]

[02:04.01]And you ain't the love song
[02:05.71]I can't keep from singing
[02:07.20]I gotta be honest
[02:08.53]You really believe that's the truth
[02:10.20]

[02:13.14]

[02:14.65]
[02:15.27]You'd never leave me
[02:16.17]

[02:19.00]

[02:24.53]

[02:26.98]
